chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
si podemos empezar! Yes
okay, i'm starting by this cool twig, veo una isla pequeña con un tigre
cómo debo continuar desde aquí?
en frente del tigre, en frente de la piedra tambien pero atras del twig
ah claro, gracias
so, i've arrived at the island with the butterfly. ¿hacia dónde ahora?
sigue el otro twig
seguro, gracias
ahora estoy donde está el loro en el árbol en la isla grande. ¿hacia dónde debo ir desde aquí?
a la izquierda del lorro, sigue derecho hasta que el debajo de los arboles debajo del loro
de acuerdo, justo ahí
sigue las tres piedras
hecho, entendido
estoy en el lugar del rana ahora, dónde debería ir después?
sigye derecho al medio de la isla (tienes que dibujar despues de la rana pero antes de los arboles verdes)
vale, de acuerdo, voy hacia allí
y despues regresas sigue el azafran
¡entiendo, voy por esa vía! ahora, veo un crocodilo, ¿qué debería hacer?
dibuja encima del crocodilo
hecho, ahora estoy nuevamente en la isla del elefante
¿a dónde ahora?
sigue la piedra negra
entendido, ya estoy en el mismo lugar que la jirafa
¿y desde aquí?
sigue al cool twigs hasta que serpiente
vale, ahora estoy junto a la serpiente
¿hacia dónde desde aquí?
y despues toca el oro
hecho, hemos llegado al tesoro, ¡lo logramos! *finished*

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
ready
great! start by moving a few steps to the left, under that wooden bench you see and across the trail towards the florist stand
but hey, don’t get carried away! i need you to do a quick 180 before you reach the florist stand, we're heading back towards our furry friend, the white dog. got it?
one sec
sure thing, take your time!
i go across to the left correct
yes, exactly! head back towards the white dog, cross over the trail again, and get ready for the next instructions
you're doing great!
and then loop back to the dog in front of the bench or behind it close to the top of the map?
hey, good question! go behind the bench this time, pretty much sticking to the top of the map. once you do, head straight down to the south
you'll end up by another white dog chilling next to a nice picnic setup. can't miss it
okay so i just crossed the log
perfecto! now continue on straight over the picnic mat
and oops! try not to step on their bowl of berries as you keep heading west
i havent drawn downward close to theflorist or picnic  blanket yet
oh, gotcha! then, from where you are, you need to head down south until you find the picnic blanket with the other white dog
shold i walk thry the middle of the picinic blanket
yeah, let's do that! just be careful not to step on the berries though
then, head to the west
and avoid the berries got it
awesome! after that, there should be a wooden branch crossing the river
do you see it? you need to get over it, heading north this time. can you do that for me?
yes
cool beans! after crossing, you'll see a green bush
give it some space and go around it from the right side until you reach the florist stand again
made it
Ive been there
fantastic! just beyond the bridge, you'll see two older folks chillin' on a bench with their newspapers
do you see them?
but just disconnected from the internet sorry
no problemo! welcome back
are you near the old folks on the bench? let’s pick up from there
yes
cool! now, move a few steps south, between these elderly newshounds and that wooden branch you see nearby
you'll come across a green bush near the end of the branch. can you get to that spot?
yes here
perfect! now, go east between the wooden branch and the bush

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
ar you ready?
sure thing! i see a tent at what looks like the top of the map
should i start moving south?
move south along the piedras. go inbetween the small gap between the piedras and the dog with the bush under it
got it, going south towards the dog and bush, then through the gap between the stones
what's next?
move south please. follow the road toward the barbecue but DONT touch the bbq, just stop above it
alright, headed south towards the bbq, stopping just before it
then go north and stop above the fire
cool, heading north and stopping by the fire
head to the east or righ. You will see two mushrooms and you need to go in between the fire and the mushrooms down south toward the blue car
ok, heading east towards the mushrooms and sliding down between the fire and the mushrooms towards the blue car
what's the next move, boss?
but dont touch the car
gotcha, i won't touch the car, waiting by it
what's next?
move to the left, so it will look like making a U turn on your map and head south to the telescop but dont touch it. stay on the road
alright, making a left and heading south towards the telescope, staying on the road and not touching it
here i am!
go the right slightly and stand on the grass next to one of the two bushes on the right. you should be standing above the bush that is next to the telescope
perfect, moving slightly to the right and standing on the grass by the bush near the telescope
i think i got it right!
now go in between the telscope and bish
ok, moving between the telescope and the bush
done!
stop on the road
roger that, stopping on the road
continue left a couple steps past the first two or tree rocks sticking out of the circle of rocks. You should move parallel to the rocks
moving left, walking parallel to the rocks, passing a couple of 'em
then head up north, drawing over where the straight line of rocks touches the circle
heading up north, tracing over where the straight line of rocks meets the circle
and then draw left and touch the house
alright, moving left and heading towards the house
great!
nice, i've reached the house! *finished*

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
hi! Yes im ready, estoy lista
great! desde donde estás, go under the first palm tree ahead of you. swing a right, passing the second tree
then, take a drastic left before you hit the third tree. keep heading south, ok?
instead of left and right, can you use north south east west
sure thing! from the third tree, start going south
cool?
working on it! one sec
no probs, take your time!
how far south do i go
you'll see a cute brown puppy
veer a bit more to the west before turning back south. keep going until you reach a couple of rocks
so basically making a u turn past the left most rock and going toward the dog?
exactly! after that lovely puppy, move south between a big rock on your left and a smaller rock on your right
then, it's straight to the water!
should I touch the puppy or stop before it
no, don't touch the pup! just go past it, keeping it on your right
then get to those rocks
should I touch the crab
no need to touch, just avoid the red crab by going west along the big rock in the water! how are you doing?
good! I crossed the width of the big rock
fantastic! keep walking westward in the water until you come across a medium-sized rock
see a shark? good. now make a sharp turn and go north!
should I touch the sharl
no! just keep it in sight as you turn north
you'll then be going back to land. cool?
and how close to the beac ball?
close but not too much
just go between the rock and the ball, heading north. alright?
yup
awesome! now just veer slightly west but keep heading north
you'll see a red tent and a big speaker. pass between them
kk
now take a slow curve around the tent heading west, then south
keep the tent on your right and the sea on your left
so move toward the canoe westward?
exactly! but instead of the water, veer right and go under the red kayak
am i going south past the kayak'
nah, turn sharply north and run along the kayak until you reach a tiny green shrub
you made it! how do you feel?
good
fantastic! thanks for being an excellent explorer
how about we do this again sometime?
where next
how about we explore a mountain map next time? we'll start from a cozy log cabin and find our way to a secret waterfall
sound cool?
where is the stoppping point
the small green bush you're at now is where this journey ends! you've done great! excited for the next one?

general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: i assume theyre comfortable in both languages or one over the other, and theyre demonstrating fluency
